text: Another 48 Hrs. is a 1990 American action comedy movie directed by Walter Hill and is the sequel to the 1982 movie 48 Hrs.. It stars Eddie Murphy, Nick Nolte, Brion James, Kevin Tighe, Ed O'Ross and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1990 action movies Category:1990 comedy movies Category:1990s buddy movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:Buddy action movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Hill Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: Another 48 Hrs.
